colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @037B (ZHES THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I BYANG CHUB LAM RIM DMAR KHRID KYI SNYING PO BSDUS PA, ^KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA RJE NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS DPAL BZANG POS, DPAL LDAN BRKA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI MKHAS GRUB 'DUS SDE RGYA MTSO LA LEGS PAR BSTZAL GYI, PHRAN BU NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSOS RNGA BA GO THOB, RANG GI BLOR ZIN TSOD BRJED THOR BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG RJE RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
